author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: Faith is the antidote for fear.

author: Russell M. Nelson
quote: The greatest compliment that can be earned here in this life is to be known as a covenant keeper.

author: Thomas S. Monson
quote: I implore each of us to prayerfully study and ponder the Book of Mormon each day.

author: Wilford W. Andersen
quote: Our children's happiness depends on their ability to hear and love the beautiful music of the gospel.

author: Thomas S. Monson
quote: We were not placed on this earth to walk alone.

author: Thomas S. Monson
quote: If you want to give a light to others, you have to glow yourself.

author: Gordon B. Hinckley
quote: You can be wise and happy or stupid and miserable. The choice is yours.
